channel.title: beach on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in beach on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great beach day
item.description: 16:56 Saturday 28 July 2018 JST We got to the beach around 10am and it was warm; by the time we left around 2pm it was hotter than I could stand to walk barefoot on the sand. We ate at a vegetarian buffet https://yoganiigata.jp/ Good for 1600 yen per person. 23:24 Saturday 28 July 2018 JST We went to see Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom last night which was pretty good for a fifth installment of a series.

item.title: dug a hole on the beach
item.description: 23 December 2017 -02 (transcribed 14:54 Sunday 31 December 2017 -02) Dug a hole for myself on the beach but it was too far from the waves to bury me in the sand. Headed down to the water a bit more and meditated with Lin. Kept moving down toward the water so I was in the waves from 0 to 40cm deep, avg 2~10cm. たのしかった Got Godot app to highlight clicked items today and got it to highlight subsequent mouseovered items and unswipe backtracked items.

item.title: Ate churascos
item.description: 14:19 Saturday 23 December 2017 -03 Lin and I just walked along the beach from the restaurante de churrascos (sp) after pretty much gorging on all the offerings. I saw some really neat rivulets on the beach (but forgot to take a picture) where water seems to just spring from the beach. I guess that is exactly what’s happening; water within the sand works its way out and then comes down to the ocean.

item.title: beach day
item.description: (transcribed 22:12 Monday 01 January 2018 JST) evening 21 December 2017 Great view of semi-fragile sand dunes, but not safe to climb ざんねん. Hot girls including one with braces. OMG why do so many adults have braces here? Finished algorithm for the app (LeSwipe / ConSwi) to deal with linking swipes to shapes while chilling in a self made hole in the beach. (pictures coming soon?) Quite interesting to see the waves coming in over the very-flat beach, so it came up significantly farther and farther with each passing unit of time.

item.title: Relaxing on the beach in Fortaleza
item.description: 14:46 Wednesday 20 December 2017 -03 Relaxing on the beach, we got some delicious drinks: manga con leche (sp) for me and acerola for Lin. Mine was sweeet and muito deliciouso (sp). A man came by with a young boy in his arms, and we ended up giving him R10 $3. Then other guys selling shirts, cashews, art, and maybe one more before we ended up just leaving instead of saying no no no no.

item.title: headed to beach with Lisa and Miho
item.description: 10:13 Sunday 16 July 2017 JST Egad I am missing SOGO again (4 times in a row) But it’s nice to see Lisa and Miho! Actually only Lisa is with us while Lin is driving, and they are all blah blah blabbin chat chat chattin and missed a turn recommended by GPS. Twice. 11:33 Sunday 16 July 2017 JST Okay we just got Miho yay! 13:07 Sunday 16 July 2017 JST Only 1 hour (4.

item.title: Great day at the beach
item.description: 20:58 Sunday 09 July 2017 JST I joined Lin who met her co-workers in Kamakura for a going away party for one of the managers. Aki had a Canon film camera with a short little lens, so I offered to give her the slightly longer lens that came with my Canon EOS.

item.title: going to the beach
item.description: 08:48 Wednesday 17 August 2016 JST Lin and I went before, and it’s just an hour from my work. I think we’re going to Miura Beach. (三浦海岸)
